title: Anuvaad Client SDK
desc: Developed a TypeScript-based client SDK for Anuvaad â€” an open-source AI-based translation platform. The SDK provides seamless integration with translation APIs, handling auth, retries, and error management for multi-language NLP workflows.

title: ANPR under Occlusion & Poor-Visibility
desc: Built an AI-powered license plate recognition system capable of detecting and recognizing number plates under occlusion, blur, and poor lighting. Utilized YOLOv5 and image preprocessing techniques, deployed via FastAPI for real-time inference.

title: Women Safety SOS
desc: Designed and developed a cross-platform mobile app using React Native to provide quick emergency assistance for women. Features include live location tracking, one-tap SOS alerts, and emergency contact notifications via SMS and WhatsApp.

title: Hospital Acquired Infections - ML Research
desc: Conducted research and built an ML pipeline to predict risk of Hospital Acquired Infections (HAIs) using patient vitals and hospital stay data. Published a paper discussing findings, performance metrics, and future applications in clinical settings.
